title: Multi-resolution Valley Bottom Flatness
description:
A topographic index designed to identify areas of deposited material

Geographic extent: Australia
Year range: 2000
Resolution: 3 arcsec (~90 m)
Data layers: Multi-resolution Valley Bottom Flatness
attribution: John Gallant; Trevor Dowling; Jenet Austin (2012): Multi-resolution Valley Bottom Flatness (MrVBF, 3" resolution). v2. CSIRO. Data Collection. 10.4225/08/512EF27AC3888
